page.title: 01Stambourne and Toppesfield
page.content: This block includes parts of the villages of Toppesfield and Stambourne together with the western edge of the larger community of Gt. Yeldham. The villages form a triangle in an arable farming area. Apart from the A604 trunk road to Harwich which runs parallel to the River Colne through Gt.Yeldham, there are few roads. A small industrial estate has been built by the disused railway station at Gt. Yeldham. St.Andrew's Primary School serves Gt.Yeldham. St. Margaret's Primary School,Toppesfield, serves Toppesfield and Stambourne. These two villages each have a village hall, playing field,public house and Church.Most of the amenities in Gt. Yeldham are in the adjoining block.
